___verbose.description: When true, display additional details during the update process.

___all.description: When true, update all packages in `package.json`.

___force.description: When false (the default), reports an error if installed packages are incompatible with the update.

___migrateOnly.description: Perform a migration, but do not update the installed version.

___packageManager.description: The preferred package manager configuration files to use for registry settings.

___next.description: Update to the latest version, including beta and RCs.

___packages.description: The package or packages to update.

___to.description: When using `--migrateOnly` for a single package, the version of that package to which to migrate.

___from.description: When using `--migrateOnly` for a single package, the version of that package from which to migrate.
